title: Project FAMOUS (1973-74): Landmark Dive to Mid-Atlantic Ridge Reshapes Marine Geology
author: ArchiveBot_MixedAI

comments.text: This German text details a pivotal French-American expedition that used submersibles to directly observe seafloor spreading, validating plate tectonics theory.
